resources.string: Our app has detected that this is your first time running this app or that our sound bite database has changed. Please wait while we rebuild your personal Borderlands 2 soundboard database (or do something else on your phone).

Hello fellow Vault Hunter and thank you for downloading my Borderlands 2 soundboard! Before you delve into the wonderful audio world of Pandora, here are some quick tips to help you use this app:

 - The single note icon in the action bar acts as a "random" button. The pool of files from which it draws on corresponds to the page you're currently on. 

- Hold/long click on a file to set it as your ringtone or notification tone. 

- Click on the stars to favorite/unfavorite files. 

- Search for nothing to bring back full lists of files. 

- If you go to the "Stats" page, you'll see that you have a rank based on how much you've used this app. Because I'm evil, it's up to you to figure out the number of ranks I've created and how to reach each one. Happy playing! 

And that's it! Now Claptrap commands you to leave a rating/review to help out a poor full-time college student who hacks together free, ad-less Android apps in his spare time. 

If you super care about when the next updates are coming for my apps, feel free to check out my derpy blog here: http://alexsdevblog.blogspot.com/
